text: XHYAT-FM is a community radio station on 94.1 FM in Ciudad Ixtepec, Oaxaca. It is known as Oaxaca Radio and owned by the civil association Yati Ne Casti, A.C. ==History== Yati Ne Casti applied for a new community radio station on November 30, 2015. The Federal Telecommunications Institute approved the application on November 15, 2017. ==References== Category:Radio stations in Oaxaca Category:Community radio stations in Mexico
title: XHYAT-FM
